EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>.
<[[ https://www.facebook.com/Martell.sg/?fref=ts]]>
<[[ https://www.facebook.com/Martell.sg/?fref=ts]]>
Thank you for registering. We look forward to partying with you at the Armin Only Embrace concert!
Use your NCF promo code AOEXNCF to get $20 off when you buy your concert ticket at galactix.asia <[[http://www.galactix.asia/]]>.
Pick up your party kit at the Martell Marquee! If you haven’t already, you can also redeemed* your NCF coupon here.
Your NCF Coupon:
Get Your Ticket <[[http://www.galactix.asia/]]>
*The NCF coupon can be redeemed once twice but only once within a 24-hour period. This coupon can be used for redemption at our Martell Marquee both in the Martell Party Tent and the Martell Bar. Please visit @martellsg.ncf <[[https://www.instagram.com/martellsg_ncf/]]> for more redemption outlets.
<[[https://www.facebook.com/Martell.sg/?fref=ts]]>

If you no longer wish to receive these emails you may unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> at any time.
